group_1.textLeft: Ah! Aimi! There she is!

group_1.textRight: Let's go hide in those shadows!
…Um? Aimi?@Is something wrong?

group_1.textLeft: Ah…Hayato…!

group_1.textRight: I thought you'd already left.@Did you forget something?

group_1.textLeft: …No…I just…@I wanted to talk to you about something…

group_1.textRight: Me? …Oh?@Aimi, there's something in your hair…

group_1.textCenter: Would it be alright if I touched it?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Oh, ah…s-sure…!

group_1.textRight: …There we go.@A leaf got tangled up there.
Did you come running?@You face is all red…

group_1.textLeft: Ah, um, I was just at the arcade with@my friends…
And…we were playing this VR shooting game…
(No, no… That's not what I wanted to talk@about…!)

group_1.textRight: You mean the new one that came out?@Was it fun?

group_1.textLeft: Um, yeah…!@I was a total scrub, but I enjoyed myself!

group_1.textRight: I see! I was wondering what that game was like.
…Ah, Aimi… If you don't mind, could I join you@next time?
I'm not really good at those kinds of games…

group_1.textLeft: S-sure! Yes!@Let's…! Let's play together…!

group_1.textRight: Oh…?@This sure doesn't sound like a confession…

group_1.textLeft: I dunno, the vibe is there!@Don't you feel it?!

group_1.textRight: The conversation seems to be going all over@the place, though.

group_1.textLeft: …She came running back.

group_1.textRight: *Gasp* *Wheeze* No…I was too embarrassed…@I couldn't do it…

group_1.textLeft: You did a great job, though!

group_1.textRight: Yeah! H-he wants to go on a date with me!@And he…touched my hair…!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah! You did it!@You really did it, Aimi!

group_1.textRight: Thank you, everyone!
I don't know… Maybe now isn't the right time…@But I'll confess to him soon.
It feels like I've made up my mind a little.

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, that's so great! Keep it up!
Now what're you gonna wear for your@arcade date?

group_1.textRight: I don't really know…@I could just do my school uniform…

group_1.textLeft: No way, no way! It's a date!@You gotta get dolled up, y'know?

group_1.textRight: Y-you're right! Um, what am I supposed to do?!@What should I wear?!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Let's go shopping together sometime@and find out!
We'll pick out the perfect date outfit for you!

group_1.textRight: Fantastic!

group_1.textLeft: Ooh... Hehe, girl talk is sooo much fun!

group_1.textRight: Now that their problems are resolved,@we better return to Mikazuki Villa.

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, I forgot about that.
Hmm… Well, we have a map showing the way@back home. Why don't we go explore a bit?
I mean, it's important to get a lay of the terrain@in case we get lost again, right?

group_1.textRight: …You have a point.

group_1.textLeft: Cool, that's settled, then!@See you guys later!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, be careful on your way home!

group_1.textLeft: I haven't been around here much, but I think@this is Kosho Ward…yeah?

group_1.textRight: If Emily's map is correct, then it appears so, yes.

group_1.textLeft: …Seeing that play out was nice, though.@It's the essence of the springtime of youth!

group_1.textRight: Do you want that?

group_1.textLeft: Hm… If you're asking me, I'm not really sure.
But it is super fun to hear about other people's@romances!

group_1.textRight: I somehow understand, and yet I don't.
This is bad, terrible, AWFUL!@I'm in a real pickle now!

group_1.textLeft: Woah! You okay, Miss?

group_1.textRight: [chara:305302:effect_shake]Ouchies…
Oh, sorry about that!@Kumi was running too hard…

group_1.textLeft: You mentioned you were in trouble?@What happened?

group_1.textRight: That's right!@I'm in some serious trouble right now…
…Say, you didn't get knocked over just then,@did you?
Hey, um! Are you interested in maid cafes@by any chance…?
There's something I need your help with!

group_1.textLeft: You're in luck! Whatever your problem, Emily and@Chisatochi's Counseling Room is here to help!
We'll be happy to lend you a hand!

group_1.textCenter: Hrrmm… Smells like we've got trouble now…
